channel.title: Comments on: Only 3 Web 2.0 companies in IRL?

item.title: By: Daniel Becker
item.dc:creator: Daniel Becker
item.description:
Yeah, I'm seeing different results. The two lists don't seem to be synced very well. We're (www.glowday.com) not on either of them yet. Must do something about that... after the long weekend. Have a good one all.
Daniel
item.content:encoded:
Yeah,
I’m seeing different results. The two lists don’t seem to be synced very well. We’re (www.glowday.com) not on either of them yet. Must do something about that… after the long weekend. Have a good one all.

Daniel

item.title: By: Brendan Lally
item.dc:creator: Brendan Lally
item.description:
I'd presumed someone had run an API thru (pulling from blogs, web 2.0 conf etc..) and then showed onto the maps. Guess maybe that was 2 much 2 ask.
Lal
item.content:encoded:
I’d presumed someone had run an API thru (pulling from blogs, web 2.0 conf etc..) and then showed onto the maps. Guess maybe that was 2 much 2 ask.

Lal

item.title: By: Brendan Lally
item.dc:creator: Brendan Lally
item.description:
Strange, I see totally different results now.. bizarre Maybe its a bug.. don't see the ones earlier - See LouderVoice and another GPS co-ord in Cork and Dublin.
?
item.content:encoded:
Strange, I see totally different results now.. bizarre
Maybe its a bug..
don’t see the ones earlier – See LouderVoice and another GPS co-ord in Cork and Dublin.

?

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: Zoom in more Lal, we've been on it for a week or two!
item.content:encoded: Zoom in more Lal, we’ve been on it for a week or two!

item.title: By: Eoghan McCabe
item.dc:creator: Eoghan McCabe
item.description: I'd say there's a whole lot more under the radar than we know about. Like FoldSpy (www.foldspy.com), for example. Coming June 2007. ;)
item.content:encoded: I’d say there’s a whole lot more under the radar than we know about. Like FoldSpy (www.foldspy.com), for example. Coming June 2007.
